des: ELDER TALKS CAREGIVING Contemplative Caregiving with Doctor John Eric Baugher by The Agewyz Podcast. Episode 179... AUDIENCE Elder Facilities & Elders Families & Elders... SUGGESTIONS FACILITIES Make this an Enriching Facility Activity for Caregivers & Elders. Gather Everyone Together. Caregiver asks Alexa about a Topic for the Group to Listen To and Discuss Amongst the Group. Then after a week Gather Everyone together again. Discuss How They Feel about The Topic. Maybe make this a Weekly Facility Activity... SUGGESTIONS FAMILIES Make this an Enriching Family Activity. Gather the Family Together. Family Member asks Alexa about a Topic for the Family to Listen To and Discuss Amongst the Family. Then after a week Gather the Family together again. Discuss How They Feel about The Topic. Maybe make this a Weekly Family Activity... SUGGESTIONS ELDERS Make this an Enriching Personal Activity. Listen to a Topic. Reflect on It. Play with It in Your Mind. Discuss It with Friends & Family. Then after a week. See How You Feel about The Topic. Maybe make this a Weekly Personal Activity... PRODUCED by Elder Radio & Television Network... POWERED by Elder Happiness Association... THANK YOU Jana Panarites of The Agewyz Podcast & Author of Scattered: My Year As An Accidental Caregiver... THANK YOU Partners for Radio TV & OnLine Content... THANK YOU Audience for Joining In The Wonderful World of Elder Happiness... THANK YOU Everyone for Creating More Elder Happiness & Less Elder Loneliness... SIGNON Welcome to Elder Talks Caregiving. Contemplative Care Giving. With Doctor John Eric Baugher. The Agewyz Podcast. Episode 179. At any time you can ask for Help. What would you like to know?... TOPICS About Contemplative Caregiving. About John. Tragedy. Rage. Sleepwalking. Healing. Connection. Study. New Orleans. Discovery. Hospice. Training. First Case. Path. Themes. Triggers. Teaching. Sugarcoating. Affirmation. Showing Up. Compassion. Disconnection. Extended Compassion. Learning. Investigation. Volunteering. Caregivers Invitation. Caregivers Loneliness. Caregivers Self Care. Caregivers Practice. Caregivers Mindfulness. Caregivers Affirmation. Podcaster Thank You. Plus. Bonus Segments... SIGNOFF Thank You. Tune In Again & All The Best In Your Elder Happiness... PODCAST The Agewyz Podcast is Available on Apple Podcasts... PODCASTER Jana Panarites is a perennial caregiver who engages with unsung heroes. People caring for family members, friends and relatives amid the demands of their own lives plus professionals in the field of aging and people using media to creatively address major health issues, foster dialogue and challenge widespread assumptions about aging. Laugh, cry, share and know you're not alone...
